item.title: 中国瞄准保证金贷款和卖空以帮助稳定股市
item.description: China's securities regulator said on Monday that it would tighten scrutiny of margin financing, malicious short selling and seek to ward off risks involving pledged shares.翻译:中国证监会周一表示，将加强对融资融券、恶意卖空行为的监管，防范质押股票风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 分析师预计稀土价格将在 2024 年下半年反弹
item.description: Rare earth prices have likely bottomed out and are poised to rise later this year on demand from electric vehicles (EVs) and wind power and as dominant producer China is expected to pull back on expanding output quotas, analysts said.翻译:分析师表示，稀土价格可能已经触底，并有望在今年晚些时候上涨，因为电动汽车和风电的需求以及主要生产国中国预计将取消扩大的产量配额。
item.author: Amy Lv, Mai Nguyen

item.title: 工作忧虑让中国人回家度假心情不好
item.description: Chinese workers packed into trains on Monday, heading home for the Lunar New Year holidays with worries about their jobs and a stuttering economy overshadowing the build-up to the long-awaited family reunions.翻译:周一，中国工人们挤上火车回家过农历新年假期，他们对工作和经济不景气的担忧给人们期待已久的家庭团聚蒙上了阴影。
item.author: Nicoco Chan, Samuel Shen

item.title: 杨恒均：这句话对中澳关系意味着什么
item.description: The suspended death sentence handed to Australian writer Yang Hengjun in Beijing on Monday is unlikely to derail Australia-China ties but will test the limits of Canberra's push to put relations back on track after years of tensions, analysts say.翻译:分析人士表示，澳大利亚作家杨恒均周一在北京被判处死刑缓期执行，这不太可能破坏澳中关系，但将考验堪培拉在多年紧张关系后推动两国关系重回正轨的努力的极限。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 独家：随着股市暴跌，中国券商限制跨境互换--消息人士
item.description: Chinese brokerages, including state-owned behemoth China International Capital Corp (CICC), have restricted the amount of cross-border swap transactions domestic investors can undertake, as authorities seek to defend the weak stock market, according to six sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据六位知情人士透露，为了捍卫疲软的股市，包括国有巨头中国国际金融公司（中金公司）在内的中国券商限制了国内投资者可以进行的跨境掉期交易金额。
item.author: Summer Zhen

item.title: 澳大利亚人杨恒均在中国被判处死刑缓期执行，他是一位富有魅力的博主、间谍小说家
item.description: Australian blogger Yang Hengjun, appearing in a Beijing court on Monday to receive a suspended death sentence on espionage charges, looked "very thin, very fragile", his friends in Sydney said.翻译:澳大利亚博主杨恒均周一在北京一家法院出庭，因间谍罪名被判处死刑缓期执行，他在悉尼的朋友说，他看起来“非常瘦弱，非常脆弱”。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 雅诗兰黛因中国需求不稳定而裁员；股价飙升19%
item.description: Estee Lauder plans to cut 3% to 5% of its global workforce as the cosmetics giant expands an effort to shore up margins squeezed by Chinese customers cutting back on higher-priced luxury products, sending its shares up as much as 19%.翻译:雅诗兰黛计划在全球裁员 3% 至 5%，因为这家化妆品巨头加大了努力，以支撑因中国客户削减高价奢侈品而受到挤压的利润率，导致其股价上涨高达 19%。
item.author: Ananya Mariam Rajesh

item.title: 美国法案对药明康德及其西方制药商合作伙伴构成风险
item.description: A draft U.S. bill that has triggered a sell-off in shares of China's biotech firm Wuxi Apptec could deal a major blow not just to the firm but could also impact many labs and Western drugmakers that rely on it for research and manufacturing, public data showed.翻译:公开数据显示，美国一项法案草案引发了中国生物技术公司药明康德股票的抛售，这不仅对该公司造成重大打击，还可能影响许多依赖该公司进行研究和制造的实验室和西方制药商。
item.author: Andrew Silver

item.title: 晨竞：狂风确实吹动了五月的娇嫩花蕾
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Alun John翻译:Alun John 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 为什么以 52 亿美元出售俄罗斯 Yandex 意义重大
item.description: A $5.2 billion cash and share deal to sell the key Russian assets of technology group Yandex , often labelled as "Russia's Google", to a consortium of Russian investors was announced on Monday after months of negotiations.翻译:经过数月的谈判后，周一宣布了一项价值 52 亿美元的现金加股票交易，将科技集团 Yandex（通常被称为“俄罗斯的谷歌”）的俄罗斯关键资产出售给俄罗斯投资者财团。
item.author: Alexander Marrow

item.title: 独家：AI芯片需求迫使华为放缓智能手机生产
item.description: Soaring appetite for Huawei's AI chips coupled with manufacturing constraints has forced the Chinese tech giant to prioritise AI and slow production for its premium Mate 60 phones.翻译:对华为人工智能芯片的需求飙升，加上制造限制，迫使这家中国科技巨头优先考虑人工智能，并放慢了其高端 Mate 60 手机的生产速度。
item.author: Fanny Potkin, Julie Zhu

item.title: 杨恒均：在中国什么是死刑缓期执行？
item.description: Australian writer and pro-democracy blogger Yang Hengjun was handed a suspended death sentence by a Beijing court on Monday, in what human rights advocates say is an unusually harsh verdict in an espionage-related case.翻译:澳大利亚作家兼民主博主杨恒均周一被北京一家法院判处死刑缓期执行，人权倡导者称，这是对间谍相关案件的异常严厉的判决。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 台湾报告九架中国军机穿越海峡中线
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Monday it had detected nine Chinese military aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait and carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" with Chinese warships.翻译:台湾国防部周一表示，发现九架中国军机穿越台湾海峡敏感的中线，并与中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 为什么中国国家队无法拯救螺旋式上升的市场
item.description: For a second day running state-backed buying likely scraped Chinese stocks from multi-year lows. Investors doubt the support will last and warn it leaves markets unbalanced and unstable.翻译:国家支持的买盘可能连续第二天将中国股市从多年低点拉升。投资者怀疑这种支持能否持续，并警告称这将导致市场失衡和不稳定。
item.author: Tom Westbrook, Summer Zhen

item.title: 菲律宾抵御来自中国黑客的网络攻击
item.description: Hackers operating in China attempted to break into websites and e-mail systems of the Philippine's president and government agencies, one promoting maritime security, but failed, an information and communications ministry official said on Monday.翻译:一名信息和通信部官员周一表示，在中国活动的黑客试图闯入菲律宾总统和政府机构的网站和电子邮件系统，其中一个目的是促进海上安全，但失败了。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 全球需求疲弱，德国12月出口令人失望
item.description: German exports fell more than expected in December due to weak global demand, data from the federal statistics office showed on Monday, underlining concerns about the health of Europe's biggest economy that may be slipping back into recession.翻译:德国联邦统计局周一公布的数据显示，由于全球需求疲软，德国12月份出口降幅超出预期，凸显了人们对欧洲最大经济体健康状况可能重新陷入衰退的担忧。
item.author: Maria Martinez

item.title: 诺基亚与中国 Vivo 签署 5G 专利协议
item.description: Finnish telecom equipment maker Nokia said on Monday it has signed a multi-year 5G patent license agreement with Chinese smartphone vendor Vivo and will begin recognising net sales from the deal in the first quarter of 2024.翻译:芬兰电信设备制造商诺基亚周一表示，已与中国智能手机供应商 Vivo 签署了一份多年期 5G 专利许可协议，并将于 2024 年第一季度开始确认该交易的净销售额。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 新加坡援引外国干涉法对付入籍公民
item.description: Singapore has designated a 59-year-old businessman as a "politically significant person" under a law on foreign interference that is being used for the first time.翻译:新加坡首次根据一项有关外国干涉的法律将一名 59 岁的商人指定为“政治重要人物”。
item.author: Xinghui Kok, Ryan Woo

item.author: Michael Church

item.title: Yandex 所有者将以 52 亿美元的交易退出俄罗斯
item.description: Yandex has struck a 475-billion-rouble deal to sell what has been dubbed "Russia's Google" to a group of Russian investors, marking the biggest corporate exit from the country since Moscow invaded Ukraine almost two years ago.翻译:Yandex 已达成一项价值 4750 亿卢布的交易，将被称为“俄罗斯谷歌”的公司出售给一群俄罗斯投资者，这是自莫斯科近两年前入侵乌克兰以来规模最大的企业退出该国的交易。
item.author: Alexander Marrow, Darya Korsunskaya, Polina Devitt
